<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Fashionista](/Spells.aspx?ID=1283)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 89 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

The target's clothes are transformed into ostentatious attire that epitomizes high-end local fashion. No details of the target's appearance transform other than their clothes, so their weapons or armor remain unchanged in appearance. The target gains a +1 status bonus on [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks to [Make a Distraction](/Actions.aspx?ID=45). You can Dismiss this spell. At the end of the spell's duration, the target's clothes revert to their original appearance.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The status bonus increases by 1, to a maximum of +4 at 7th level.
name: Fashionista
